short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a picture from your webcam, and you can save the snapshot image to Google Drive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free WebCam Snapshot - take a quick picture with a webcam and save the image to Google Drive. Screenshot WebCam Snapshot is a popular and useful application to create selfie photos with your webcam. You can also create GIF images from the Free WebCam Snapshot application.

We support the most popular image formats you can save, such as png, jpg.
